other_tests.findings: 4 mm T2 hyperintense nonenhancing lesion in segment 2 of the liver; 1.5 cm segment 4 lesion consistent with biliary hamartomas/cysts; trace perihepatic ascites; gallbladder mildly distended with marked wall edema; small gallstones; T2 hyperintense nonenhancing lesions in the body and tail of the pancreas likely representing side-branch IPMNs; T2 hyperintense nonenhancing renal lesions bilaterally consistent with cysts.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Small gallstones were better seen on prior ultrasound study.
